Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Albion
ShortDescription: Southbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Pratt, Ridge, Devon and Clark: due to, street blockage near Clark/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Pratt, Ridge, Devon and Clark: due to, street blockage near Clark/Albion.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier door problem at Wellington. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Wellington.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
